revision.text:
{{botnav}} * '''ig:''' Page nkena bu nga onye nwere '''[[:en:Wikipedia:Bots|bot]]''' ochoro ekwe bia na Wikipedia, kwesiri tinye aha bot ahu, t'enye ya '''bot-status'''. Onye ahu kwesiri ma otu agee mee ya (guo ya!). Anyi nile gi me vote mana ekwe bot ahu nwe ''bot-status''. Ma bot nwetee vote, onye nwe ya kwesiri tinye aha ya la '''[[m:Requests_for_bot_status]]''' page ta '''nde-ukwu''' ma, nye bot ahu status. * '''en:''' Requests for the [[m:bot|bot]] flag should be made on this page. This wiki uses the [[m:bot policy|standard bot policy]], and allows [[m:bot policy#Automatic_approval|automatic approval of certain types of bots]] (but not [[m:bot policy#Global_bots|global bots]]). Other bots should apply below, and then [[m:Steward requests/Bot status|request access]] from a steward if there is no objection. {{/Header}} ==Mgbe igi vote== '''Nwere otu picture nkee tinye vote gi''' (''use one of these pictures to vote''): [[Image:Symbol_support_vote.svg|16px]] [[Image:Symbol_support_vote.svg|16px]] [[Image:Symbol_oppose_vote.svg|16px]] [[Image:Symbol_oppose_vote.svg|16px]] [[Image:Symbol_neutral_vote.svg|16px]] [[Image:Symbol_neutral_vote.svg|16px]] [[Image:Symbol_unsupport_vote.svg|16px]] [[Image:Symbol_unsupport_vote.svg|16px]] :[[Image:Symbol_support_vote.svg|16px]] '''Support''' - he mere isi kwe a lee bot bia (''why you support the request'') ::[[Image:Symbol_unsupport_vote.svg|16px]] '''Discard''' - he mere isi cho i wefu vote gi (''why you are removing your support'') :[[Image:Symbol_oppose_vote.svg|16px]] '''Oppose''' - he mere ikweghi a lee bot bia (''why you oppose the nominee'') :[[Image:Symbol_neutral_vote.svg|16px]] '''Neutral''' - he ichoro iku maka uwa na bot ahu (''what you have to say about the matter'') ← explanation is mandatory with this vote
'''You can also use these templates:'''[[Image:Symbol_support_vote.svg|16px|Ee]] [[Template:Accept| Accept]]{{#if: {{{1|}}}|{{{1}}}}}{{subst:accept |''he ichoro iku''}}[[Image:Symbol_oppose_vote.svg|16px|Uh-uh]] [[Template:Oppose| Oppose]]{{#if: {{{1|}}}|{{{1}}}}}{{subst:oppose |''he ichoro iku''}}[[Image:Symbol_neutral_vote.svg|16px|Amaghi'm]] [[Template:Neutral| Comment]]{{#if: {{{1|}}}|{{{1}}}}}{{subst:neutral |''he ichoro iku''}}[[Image:Symbol_unsupport_vote.svg|16px|Wefu]] [[Template:Discard| Discard]]{{#if: {{{1|}}}|{{{1}}}}}{{subst:discard |''he ichoro iku''}}
==Ndi bots e mere nominate==
Time bu '''{{FULLDATE|type=wiki}}''' {| style="margin: 0 auto; font-size:smaller; background:none;" |'''[{{SERVER}}{{localurl:{{NAMESPACE}}:{{PAGENAMEE}}|action=purge}} Purge page cache] mgbe nominations adigi updated.''' |}
{{BRFA|SassoBot||Closed}} {{BRFA|Kwjbot||Closed}} {{BRFA|Synthebot||Open}} {{BRFA|Darkicebot||Open}} {{BRFA|Xqbot||Open}} {{BRFA|Rubinbot||Open}} {{BRFA|Luckas-bot||Open}} == [[User:NobelBot]] == * '''Bot name''' : [[:ar:User:NobelBot]] * '''Operator''' : [[:ar:User:جمال بركات|جمال بركات]] * '''Programming Language''' : Python (Pywikipedia) * '''Function''' : interwiki * '''Botstatus on other wiki''' : ar, fr, en, pl, ru... [[User:NobelBot|NobelBot]] 14:55, 15 March 2009 (UTC) Discussion == Request for removal == * [[user:Byrialbot]] is inactive for more then 6 months. Last edit made on this or any other wikipedia is made in august 2007. The bot was only a few months active. And has made here 46 edits. [[User:Carsrac|Carsrac]] 07:52, 28 June 2008 (UTC) :'''Support''' - this bot has been inactive since last year. -- [[User talk:Kerowren|Kerowren]] ([[User talk:Kerowren|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Kerowren|contribs]]) 20:09, 27 July 2008 (UTC) :'''Support''' so that we can open up a space in the quota system. I suggest putting a request in to a steward to have this taken care of. -[[User:Djsasso|Djsasso]] 03:20, 29 January 2009 (UTC) ::{{done}} by steward. -[[User:Djsasso|Djsasso]] 20:24, 16 February 2009 (UTC) * [[User:YonaBot]] is also inactive for more then 6 months and has only done 7 edits. [[User:CarsracBot|CarsracBot]] 10:10, 28 June 2008 (UTC) : The owner reacted [[:en:User_talk:Carsrac#bot_on_ig|on my english talk page]] [[User:Carsrac|Carsrac]] 17:19, 28 June 2008 (UTC) :'''Support''' - this bot has been inactive since last year. -- [[User talk:Kerowren|Kerowren]] ([[User talk:Kerowren|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Kerowren|contribs]]) 20:09, 27 July 2008 (UTC) :'''Support''' so that we can open up a space in the quota system. I suggest putting a request in to a steward to have this taken care of. -[[User:Djsasso|Djsasso]] 03:20, 29 January 2009 (UTC) ::{{done}} by steward. -[[User:Djsasso|Djsasso]] 20:24, 16 February 2009 (UTC) * [[User:Robbot]] is inactive at the moment, but the owner is a steward and it is wise not to remove the flag. That he has still has a bot with a botflag here to do the things stewards do or for undo the damage other iw bots some times do. [[User:CarsracBot|CarsracBot]] 10:10, 28 June 2008 (UTC) : I agree, nevertheless, the bot is active now. -- [[User talk:Kerowren|Kerowren]] ([[User talk:Kerowren|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Kerowren|contribs]]) 20:09, 27 July 2008 (UTC) : As a further explanation, this bot is not really inactive, but I usually run it with a whenneeded option. This means that it will not make edits to add just one language, but only if there are several languages to be added at once, if links have to be removed or if they have to be changed to resolve problems. These are all relatively rare occurences, and furthermore I rarely run the bot autonomously, and cannot run it at work, so compared to other bots its activity will be very low. Apart from that, I do not really care about bot flags - I much like to have the right for my bot to do its few edits, but whether it does it with or without a flag I leave wholly up to you. - [[User:Andre Engels|Andre Engels]] 11:27, 6 October 2008 (UTC) ==Global bots== Hello. The [[m:Bot policy|standard bot policy]] was updated to allow global bots, which are now technically possible. These are trusted bots that will be given bot access on all wikis that allow global bots (the local policy or request page must explicitly allow them, or they won't get access on this wiki). The [[m:Bot policy#Global_bots|current requirements]] for global bots are: * the bot must only maintain interlanguage links or fix double-redirects; * the bot must already be active on several wikis, with long-term contributions to back up its trustworthiness. Does anyone object to allowing global bots on this wiki? I'll update the local policy in a week if there are no objections. Thanks. —[[m:User:Pathoschild|Pathoschild]] 00:44:27, 27 July 2008 (UTC) : The problem with having global bots is that, with there being so many of them, this wiki's bot quota will quickly fill up, creating an influx of locally unregistered bots for a small article space. I think it might be best to hold off on opening that particular door just yet, at least until we reach the 1000 articles range. -- [[User talk:Kerowren|Kerowren]] ([[User talk:Kerowren|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Kerowren|contribs]]) 20:20, 27 July 2008 (UTC) :: Okay. —[[m:User:Pathoschild|Pathoschild]] 19:35:41, 04 August 2008 (UTC) :Just to be sure: by locally unregistered bots, do you mean they didn't create their accounts locally, or you're afraid their edits will be visible in the Recent Changes (they won't)?. Best regards, [[User:Malafaya|Malafaya]] 22:29, 9 October 2008 (UTC) Since there is no active admin or bureaucrat here and I am only a temporary admin I am reopening this discussion. I think Kerowren just didn't fully understand the benefits of allowing global bots on this wiki. Global bots are actually intended for wikis that are this small so that the wiki does not have to focus on bot request and can focus on article writing instead. If I don't hear any objects in the next week I will ask a steward to turn global bots on for this wiki. -[[User:Djsasso|Djsasso]] 03:06, 14 June 2009 (UTC) :No I understood, but I was worried about the wiki being overrun by bots. I'll let you use your discretion on the matter though if you would prefer global. -- [[User talk:Kerowren|Kerowren]] ([[User talk:Kerowren|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Kerowren|contribs]]) 05:41, 14 June 2009 (UTC) :: I would suggest you allow global bots, as that would give the [[m:stewards|stewards]] and the meta/global community the responsibibilty of following the behavior of the bots/bot owners. Of course, if you find something is wrong with a bot, you can block it, or contact the stewards to do so, but you wouldn't need to use as much time on this page as you do now; and hopefully use that time on creating content. [[User:Laaknor|Laaknor]] 11:52, 14 June 2009 (UTC) ::: I hope that everyone understand that the limited bots allowed local policy will overruled by this global policy. The fact that there is no local admin anymore changed a lot. The bot edits will not increase a lot, they will be done quicker. I have no objection, but I'm only bot user of this wiki and I think that the temp admin and the local users has a vote in this. [[User:Carsrac|Carsrac]] 16:30, 15 June 2009 (UTC) ::::We actually already have standard bot policy and the stewards have always deferred granting local flags because the local rule overrules the global rule. But, if you mean global bots will be counted outside the limited bots idea then yes you are correct they won't be limited by the local rule. Most of these bots are editing here anyways so might as well let them have the flag globally so the change list is a little less spammed. Although its not that spammed to begin with. -[[User:Djsasso|Djsasso]] 17:13, 15 June 2009 (UTC) I'm reading the discussion has the global bot-part of the global bot policy should be allowed on this wiki. I have enabled it for this wiki. If you experience problems with it, please let me know on [[m:User talk:Laaknor|my usertalk on meta]]. [[User:Laaknor|Laaknor]] 17:18, 6 July 2009 (UTC) == See also == * [[:Special:ListUsers/bot|Current bot list]] ---- [[Category:Wikipedia bots]] [[en:Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval]]

[[Usòrò:LocationAfrica.png|thumb|250px|Afrịka n'uwa]] '''Afrịka''' bu aha bekeee ana-kpo obodo ukwu ndi oji (ala ndi njirinji) n'uwa nka. Ndi ''scientists'' che la Afrịka bu ebe ndi madu mbu biata l'uwa.
Igbo bu asusu ana asu na ndida anyawu [[Naigeria]], indi na asu asusua but Ndi Igbo. Igbo bu asus puru iche, ndi na asu ya pukwara iche. [[Schluesseldienst-Hamburg|Schluesseldienst Hamburg]]

[[Ákwúkwó orünotu:LocationAsia.png|thumb|280px|Ebe Asia no n'uwa]] '''Asia''' bu aha bekee ana-kpo obodo na ala ukwu nwere ndi [[China]] ma ndi [[Ndia]]. Mgbe ozo, adi kpo ya ''Eurasia'' kama ala ndi ocha ana-kpo [[Mpaghara Russia]] no la ya. [[Afrịka]] soto ya na onu agugu madu bi na ya.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Afrịka]] * [[Amerikas]] * [[Obodo Békè]]

[[Usòrò:Siblings 1900 hg.jpg|thumb|Nwanne]] '''Nwanne''' bụ mádu nke nwéré ótụ ndi múrú ya di òfu. Nwanne bu nwoke bụ Nwanne nwoke; na nwanne bu nwanyi bu nwanne nwanyi. Na [[ọgbá]] di íché na ùwà, nwanne ne tó kọ na há ne jị ogẹ di imérímé à nókóktá na Í kpá onwé há. Ihe ọbạrạ na ihe nor nà íshí gi me ihe nà óbị nwanne, ma o bu ihe ómá, ma o bu ihe ọjö. Óbị nwanne nwèrè màkà onwé ha di ímérímé na ọ gbàsàrà ihe ne me na ùwà há dí kà ọtụ ndi múrú ha nà kpá ha, ọtụ há shị à mú, àgwa há, na ihe méré na ùwà há nke éméghị na umunna há.
{{ÉdéNtạ}}

{{Disambiguation}}
<!--this is different from "Americans"-->
[[ru:Американский]]

'''Amerika''' nwere ike bu: * Aha ana-kpo ala '''[[United States of Amerika]]''' ('''[[USA]]''') * Aha obodo ukwu bu ''[[North Amerika]]'' na ''[[South Amerika]]'' * [[Amerikas]]
{{Disambiguation}}

{{Ngwómárí Obodo |native_name = United States |conventional_long_name = Njikota Obodo Emerika |image_flag = Flag of the United States.svg |image_coat = US-GreatSeal-Obverse.svg | symbol_type = Ihü | image_map = United States (orthographic projection).svg | map_width = 220px |asusu_obodo = [[Bekee]] }} '''Njikota Obodo Emerika''' bu ala no n'ime obodo ukwu adi-kpo ''[[Olile anyanwu Emerika]]''. Obu enyi [[Kánada]] ma ndi [[bekee]] (n'oge nka). Mgbe ufodu, ana kpo ya ''US'', ''USA'', na ''[[Emerika]]'' kwaa. Ndi [[bekee]] bu ndi bidoro ya na mgbe gara-aga, bụo [[Diạlạ Emerika]] bu ndi nola nga mbu. N'oge nka, obodo ahu bu ndi shi ike n'uwa. revision.text:
[[Usòrò:GustaveDoreParadiseLostSatanProfile.jpg|300px|thumb|Onyonyo ''Satan'' nwoke bu nke [[:en:Gustave Doré|Gustave Doré]] sere. O nwetere ya na akwuko adi-kpo ''[[:en:Paradise Lost|Paradise Lost]]'', nke [[:en:John Milton|John Milton]] dere.]] Onye ana-kpo '''''Ekwe nsu''''' bu onye mmuo na echiche ndi [[Christian]] ma ndi umu [[Abraham]] nile, onye iro wo, ma [[Chineke]] wo.
Okwu ochie nke sotelu "Ekwensu":
E wetara n'echiche ndi christain na mbe chineke ndi christain kere uwa a, o bido na n'bido kere ana na mmiri, site ebe anwa were kere anu na ugwu nile. Ebe o kesiri ihe nile folu nwoke, o we gwa onwe ya, ka m' kere ihe yilu mu. Nya ka o jilu we kere nwoke, site na nkpo nwoke we kelu nwayi. mbe ekere chineke nile mefe si ka ekwensu bia so nwayi chi kere a na po eve we gwa ya, **nwayi, jelu na ugwu buta ezi echiche weta olili ugwu we rie**. Nwaye we zata ekwensu, gwa ya na chineke keta ya kpa iwu na onye okere a kwesighi site na ugwu bu ezi echiche ri oriri. Ekwensu we gwa nwayi na chineke tu ugha na ihe ge solu isite na ugwu echiche rie bu ihe oma.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Jesus Christ]] * [[Christianity]]
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
[[Òtù:Éféfé]]

Obula onye ''[[People's Democratic Party]]'' mgbe ha hafuo wo, ga na ''[[Progressive Peoples Alliance]] party''.<ref>{{cite web |url= http://www.orjikalu.com/biography.php|title= Governor Orji Uzor Kalu|accessdate=2007-03-31 |work= Orjikalu.com}}</ref> Na [[11 Julaị]], [[2007]] ndi EFCC [[Naigeria]] mere ya ''arrest'' si ha bula onye ojo.

Umeh |- style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left;" | '''Secretary''' | Dr. Sani Shinkafi |- | colspan="2" bgcolor="{{{{{party_articletitle}}}/meta/color}}"| |- style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left;" | '''Founded''' | [[2003]] |- style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left;" |'''Headquarters''' | 41b Libreville Crescent , Opp. Tulip Press, Aminu Kano Crescent , Wuse 11, [[Abuja]] |- | colspan="2" bgcolor="{{{{{party_articletitle}}}/meta/color}}"| |- style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left;" |{{nowrap| '''Political Ideology'''}} | [[Progressive]] |- style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left;" |'''Colours''' | [[Green]], [[White]] |- | colspan="2" bgcolor="{{{{{party_articletitle}}}/meta/color}}"| |- style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left;" |'''Website''' | [http://www.inecnigeria.org/index.php?do=political&id=11] |- | colspan="2" bgcolor="{{{{{party_articletitle}}}/meta/color}}"| |- style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left;" |'''See also''' |[[List of political parties in Nigeria|Political parties no na Nigeria]] |} '''All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA)''' bu otu ''political party'' no n'ime government [[Naigeria]]. Ndi na nwere otu madu bu onye governor na state no na Naigeria. [[Chukwuemeka Odumegwu Ojukwu]] bu onye wo.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Chukwuemeka Ojukwu]] * [[List of political parties in Nigeria|''Political parties'' no la Naigeria]]

revision.text:
[[Usòrò:Echmiadzin-hripsime.jpg|thumb|right|300px|Ulo uka, Echmiadzin]] '''Ulo uka''' bu ebee nde di ekpee chi di bia ha kpe-ekpere wo. Na mbu, ha dila ekpe ebee masiri wo n'ezi, du mgbe ha bidoro i ''buildu'' ulo uka. Aha ha ji a mata ulo uka wo gbasaa wo: ndi [[Islam]] na kpo ulo uka wo ''mosque'', ndi [[Jew]] a kpo nke ha, ''synagogue''. Dika ndena, ndi ekpere chi Jesus - [[Christian|ndi Christians]] - nwere aha ha ji a mata ulo uka wo.
Aha ha na kpo ya nwere ike bu ''church'', ma ''temple'', m'obu ''chapel'', ma otu nde ''Catholic'' ma ndi ''Orthodox'' na kpo nke wo: cathedral.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Christian]] * [[Jews]] * [[Muslim]]
[[Òtù:Éféfé]] [[Òtù:Ulò]]
[[en:Place of worship]]

revision.text: [[User:{{{User|{{{1|Example}}}}}}|{{ucfirst:{{{User|{{{1|''Example''}}}}}}}}]] ([[User talk:{{{User|{{{1|Example}}}}}}|talk]] · [[Special:Contributions/{{{User|{{{1|Example}}}}}}|contribs]] · [http://tools.wikimedia.de/~interiot/cgi-bin/Tool1/wannabe_kate?username={{urlencode:{{ucfirst:{{{User|{{{1|Example}}}}}}}}}}&site={{SERVERNAME}} count] · [{{fullurl:Special:Log|user={{anchorencode:{{ucfirst:{{{User|{{{1|Example}}}}}}}}}}}} logs] · [{{fullurl:Special:Log/block|page=User:{{anchorencode:{{ucfirst:{{{User|{{{1|Example}}}}}}}}}}}} block log] · [{{fullurl:Special:Listusers|limit=1&username={{urlencode:{{ucfirst:{{{User|{{{1|Example}}}}}}}}}}}} lu])[[Category:Internal link templates|Usercheck]]
{{<includeonly>subst:</includeonly>RfA|User=USERNAME|Description=IHE IGI KWU BASARA NOMINEE - YOUR DESCRIPTION OF THE USER <includeonly>~~</includeonly><includeonly>~~</includeonly>}}

==N'Igbo== ===Mee onwe gi nominate=== # Wefu USERNAME na box no n'okpuru, tinye aha gi, clickye button. # "Editye" page igi hu, guo he no nga, ge ya mee nominate. # "Editye" page, '''wefu ebe bu acceptance line'''. Mee "save" page ahu. # Changeye oge no nga t'obu oge imere he nu. # '''[{{fullurl:Wikipedia:Requests for adminship|action=edit}} "Editye" page nkee]''', tinye he na n'elu nominations ozo no nga: #: '''{{Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/}} ''' type=create preload=Template:RfAsubst default=Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/USERNAME buttonlabel=Mee nominate gi bgcolor=#eeeeff width=50 ===Mee nominate onye ozo=== # Wefu USERNAME na box no n'okpuru, tinye onye ahu ichoro ime nominate # "Editye" page igi hu, guo ya mee ogwara gi t'ime nominate. # Gwa onye idi nominate na ''talkpage'' ya. Tinye link page nke mbu ([[Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/]]). Inwere ike gwa wo otu na: Tinye otu template nde na page onye ahu: #:'''{{subst:RfA-nom|}}''' :Mgbe adi nomination abuo, tinye mkpisi agugu ahu, otu na, '''{{subst:RfA-nom||2}}''', mgbe ikwesiri. :'''Ikwesiri tinye page nke mbu (RfA) na "Wikipedia:Requests for adminship" tupu onye ahu kwere.''' Mgbe okwere, tinye {{subst:RfA talk||EDIT STATS}} na discussion page, tinye edit stats ya. type=create editintro=Template:RfA instructions preload=Template:RfAsubst default=Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/USERNAME buttonlabel=Me nominate onye ozo bgcolor=#eeeeff width=50 ===Mgbe madu mere gi nominate=== # Ga na ''RfA subpage'' gi (Wikipedia:Request for adminship/). Kwe m'ekwela, de ya na RfA page ahu. Mgbe ikweghi, gwa onye mere gi nominate. # Mgbe ikwere, m'ichosiri za ajuju no na page ahu, za. # Changeye oge no nga t'obu oge imere he nu.. # '''[{{fullurl:Wikipedia:Requests for adminship|action=edit}} "Editye" page nkee]''', tinye he na n'elu nominations ozo no nga: #: '''{{Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/}}
----''' ==In English== ===To nominate yourself=== # Replace USERNAME with your user name in the box below and click the button. # Edit the resulting page and follow the generated instructions to fill in the nomination. Save the page. # Edit the page, '''and delete the acceptance line'''. Also answer the standard questions for all candidates. Save the page. # Change the time on the RfA page to indicate the current time. # '''[{{fullurl:Wikipedia:Requests for adminship|action=edit}} Edit this page]''', adding the following text above the most recent nomination (replacing USERNAME with your name): #: '''{{Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/USERNAME}} ''' type=create preload=Template:RfAsubst default=Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/USERNAME buttonlabel=Nominate yourself bgcolor=#eeeeff width=50 ===To nominate someone else:=== # Replace USERNAME with the user name of the person you wish to nominate in the box below. # Edit the resulting page, following the instructions to fill in the nomination. # Notify the user you are nominating them on his/her user talk page, and include a link to the page you just created ([[Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/USERNAME]]). You may choose to inform them by placing the RfA nomination template on their talk page, which will automatically contain a link to their nomination page: #:'''{{subst:RfA-nom|YOUR USERNAME}}''' :If there is a second nomination, please add a number, for example '''{{subst:RfA-nom|YOUR USERNAME|2}}''', if applicable. :'''Do not add the RfA to Wikipedia:Requests for adminship until the candidate has accepted.''' Once they have accepted, add {{subst:RfA talk|USERNAME|EDIT STATS}} to the discussion page, and add their edit stats. type=create editintro=Template:RfA instructions preload=Template:RfAsubst default=Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/USERNAME buttonlabel=Nominate another user bgcolor=#eeeeff width=50 ===What to do if you are nominated by someone else:=== # Go to your RfA subpage, and either accept or decline your nomination. If you decline, be sure to inform your nominator. # After you accept your nomination, make sure to answer the standard questions for all candidates. # Change the time on your RfA page to indicate the current time. # '''[{{fullurl:Wikipedia:Requests for adminship|action=edit}} Edit this page]''' and add the following text '''above''' the most recent nomination (replacing USERNAME with your name): #: '''{{Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/USERNAME}}
----'''

===[[{{<includeonly>subst:</includeonly>FULLPAGENAME}}|{{{User}}}]]=== '''[{{fullurl:{{<includeonly>subst:</includeonly>FULLPAGENAME}}|action=edit}} Voice your opinion]''' '''(0/0/0); Scheduled to end {{<includeonly>subst:</includeonly>#time: H:i, [[j F]] [[Y]] "(UTC)"|+7 days}}'''
{{User|{{{User<noinclude>|Example User</noinclude>}}}}} - {{{Description<noinclude>|{{lorem|2}}</noinclude>}}} ====Questions for candidate==== Dear candidate, thank you for offering to serve Wikipedia as an administrator. You may wish to answer the following <u>optional</u> questions to provide guidance for participants: :'''1.''' What admin work do you intend to take part in? ::'''A:''' <noinclude>{{lorem}}</noinclude>
:'''2.''' What are your best contributions to Wikipedia, and why? ::'''A:''' <noinclude>{{lorem}}</noinclude>
:'''3.''' Have you been in any conflicts over editing in the past or have other users caused you stress? How have you dealt with it and how will you deal with it in the future? ::'''A:''' <noinclude>{{lorem}}</noinclude>
====Comments and Discussions==== * Links for {{{User}}}: {{usercheck-short|{{{User|Example User}}}}} ---- '''Support, oppose, or abstain below this line:'''

===[[Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/Kerowren|Kerowren]]=== <!-- '''[{{fullurl:Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/Kerowren|action=edit}} Voice your opinion]''' --> '''Final (3/0/0); Scheduled to end 23:55, [[01 June]] [[2007]] (UTC)'''
{{User|Kerowren}} - I was born in America but lived in "Igboland" for five to seven years of my life, so I know some Igbo. I have been here for a while (six months looks like) and I'm just here to do my best because I really want to see this fledgling wiki go places. I think I've contributed a lot of articles (lol) and though my Igbo is not the best, which means I usually have to go back to re-edit, it moves us along. So I guess I'm here to stay. -- [[User:Kerowren|Kerowren]] 23:55, 24 May 2007 (UTC) ====Questions for candidate==== Dear candidate, thank you for offering to serve Wikipedia as an administrator. You may wish to answer the following <u>optional</u> questions to provide guidance for participants: :'''1.''' What admin work do you intend to take part in? ::'''A:''' Any for which I am needed. This includes the rare vandal patrol, requested informations, and various cleanup jobs I might be needed for.
:'''2.''' What are your best contributions to Wikipedia, and why? ::'''A:''' I would say my contributions to [[Chinua Achebe]] and [[Biafra]] as they are largely the most encyclopedic so far.
:'''3.''' Have you been in any conflicts over editing in the past or have other users caused you stress? How have you dealt with it and how will you deal with it in the future? ::'''A:''' I have never been in conflicts (or stressed) over editing in the past, (save, perhaps, with myself) but I will deal with any that may arise through mediation and a cool-off period to refocus on priorities. ====Comments and Discussions==== * Links for Kerowren: {{usercheck-short|Kerowren}} ---- '''Support, oppose, or abstain below this line:'''
#Support. Glad someone with a grasp of the language is here, I can't say that is so for all African language Wikipedia editions. Once you are an admin I should probably let my temporary adminship here lapse (it expires some time in June.) [[User:Picaroon9288|Picaroon]] [[User talk:Picaroon9288|(Talk)]] 00:43, 25 May 2007 (UTC) #Support. Seems a good contributor. Native language speaker. Should be a qualified admin. [[User:Bastique|Bastique]] 16:37, 25 May 2007 (UTC) #Support --[[User:Barryland|Barryland]] 21:43, 25 May 2007 (UTC) ---- The result of this request for adminship was '''promotion'''.

[[Usòrò:Location Canada.svg|thumbnail|right|250px|Ebe Kánada no n'uwa]] [[Usòrò:Flag of Canada.svg|thumbnail|right|250px|Okoloto Kánada]]
'''Kánada''' bu ala no n'ime obodo ukwu adi-kpo [[Olile anyanwu Amerika]]. Ono la aga [[USA]] bu enyi na nwanne ya n'oge nka, maka ndi [[békè']] bidoro Amerika bidoro yawa. Dika otu mere na Amerika, mgbe ndi [[békè']] biara, ha bụrụ ndi ''Native Amerikans'' nola nga mgbu, nwere ala wo. [[Usòrò:Canada-satellite.jpg|thumb|250px|right|Satellite]]
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Olile anyanwu Amerika]] * [[Amerikas]]
==Links na ga n'ezi== * [http://www.gc.ca/ Ndi government Kánada]

[[Ákwúkwó orünotu:World ocean map.gif|right|thumb|250px|Oke osimiri nile n'uwa bara ya buru-buru.]][[Usòrò:Mappemonde oceanique Serret.gif|thumb| the World Ocean [http://mappamundi.free.fr/ mappemonde océanique Serret]]] '''Oke osimiri''' bu miri ukwu-ukwu na ba uwa buru-buru. Adi otu oke osimiri n'uwa, nke ana kpo ''World Ocean'', a kewasi ya n'ise: [[Pacific Ocean|Pacific]], [[Atlantic Ocean|Atlantic]], ma ufodi, [[Indian Ocean|Indian]], [[Arctic Ocean|Arctic]], na [[Southern Ocean|Southern]].
''Oshimiri Pacifik'' bu miri hiri nne, kachasiri osimiri ndi ozo, ''Atlantic Ocean'' a soro ya.
[[Òtù:Oshimiri]]

revision.text:
{| border=0" class="toccolours" align="right" style="width:23em; font-size:90%; !Benjamin Nnamdi Azikiwe |- | |- |
|- !1st [[President of Naigeria]] |- |'''Preceded by''' ''None (position created)'' |- |'''Succeded by''' [[:en:Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi|Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi]] |- |
|- !3rd [[:en:Governor-General of Naigeria|Governor-General of Naigeria]] |- |'''Preceded by''' [[:en:James Robertson|James Robertson]] |- |'''Succeded by''' ''None (position abolished)'' |- |
|- |'''Political party''' National of Nigeria and the Cameroons
Nigerian People's Party
 |- |'''Religion''' [[Christianity]]{{cite web |url= http://www.dawodu.com/mamza16.htm|title=Odd Men For Odd Political Jobs: Its Time Up!|last=Mamza|first=Paul |accessdate=2007-05-03 |work= Dawodu.com|publisher=Segun Toyin Dawodu}} |} '''Nnamdi "Zik" Azikiwe''', bu onye isi-ala izizi [[Nigeria]] nwere. Ochichi ya bidolu na afo 1963 welu ruo na afo 1966. Mana onwenyi kwa ike ime ihe obula. Ike di n'aka Prime Minista Abubakar Tafawa-Balewa. Zik na agho aghugho dika mbe. Nya melu na mu afuro ya na anya nke ukwuu. Mana Zik bu oyili dike egwu, gaa gaa n'ogwu, anu kpolunku na eju onu. Omechalu ndi ocha ife, aru afolo fa. Zik latakwalu otu onu ya. Nwanyi ikpe azu onulu bu obele nwa ofulu ebe ona agba egwu ugwu. Umunna, udo dili uno. Zik nwa nna anyi bu onye chi goziri nke ukwuu. Amamihe yabu nwa amadi di oke egwu. Oke iwe m bu na ndi igbo ufodu bu ndi nzuzu anaghi a kwanyere Zik ugwu ruru ya. O bu ihe inwute na onye kporo onwe ya onye Igbo nwere onu-nsi eji akato Zik. O buru na ndi ochichi ndi Igbo ma o bu ndi ochichi Naijiria nwere ike ime ihe oma Zik mere, obodo anyi a kabugo obodo oyibo. Ihere buruu onye o bula na-akpari nna anyi Zik, dika ikuku si ebu abuba ojo. == References ==

[[Image:Attention niels epting.svg|50px]] '''This {{#switch:{{NAMESPACE}}|0=article|page}} needs {{ #if: {{{1|}}} |translation from [[{{{1}}}]]|translation}}.''' [[Image:Attention niels epting.svg|50px]]
Please translate if you know [[Asusu Igbo|Igbo]]!
[[Category:Wikipedia articles needing translation]]

revision.text:
[[Usòrò:Pacific Ocean.png|right|200px|Pacific Ocean]]'''Pacific Ocean''' bu [[oke osimiri]] e kere mgbe a kewasiri-akewa [[Osimiri uwa]] n'ise. O kachasiri ndi miri ozo nile e kere na oke osimiri ahu. Pacific Ocean no na aga [[Asia]] na Australia na otu aka, no na agaga ala ukwu [[Amerikas|Amerika]] na aka ozo, bu n'elu [[Antarctica]] ma okpuru ebe [[Arctic]].
== Lee nke ozo == * [[Atlantic Ocean]]
[[Òtù:Oshimiri]]

[[Usòrò:Atlantic Ocean.png|right|200px|Atlantic Ocean]] [[Usòrò:Sunset on tenerife canary island atlantic ocean.jpg|right|200px]] '''Atlantic Ocean''' bu [[oke osimiri]] e kere mgbe a kewasiri-akewa [[Osimiri uwa]] n'ise. O bu nke abwo hiri nne, nke mbu buru [[Pacific Ocean]]. Oke osimiri ahu no na aga [[Afrika]] ma ala ukwu [[Amerikas|Amerika]], no n'elu [[Antarctica]] ma okpuru ebe [[Arctic]].
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Pacific Ocean]]
[[Òtù:Oshimiri]]

revision.text:
[[Usòrò:Southern Ocean.png|right|200px|Southern Ocean]] Oke osimiri nke ana kpo '''''Southern Ocean''''', ma '''''Antarctic Ocean''''' na '''''South Polar Ocean''''' ufodu, bu oke osimiri e kere mgbe a kewasiri-ekewa [[Osimiri uwa]] n'ise. O bu osimiri nke ano hiri nne, osimiri nke mbu bula ''[[Pacific Ocean]]'' na ''[[Atlantic Ocean]]'', bu nke e kere la azu. O no na okpuru ala uwa nile, no n'elu [[Antarctica]].
== Lee nke ozo == * [[Indian Ocean]]
[[Òtù:Geography]]

revision.text:
[[Usòrò:Indianocean.png|right|200px|Indian Ocean]] '''Indian Ocean''' bu otu oke osimiri e kere mgbe a kewasiri-akewa [[Osimiri uwa]] n'ise. O bu nke ato hiri nne, nke mbu na ano buru ''[[Pacific Ocean|Pacific]]'' na ''[[Atlantic Ocean]]''. Indian Ocean no na okpuru ala ndi India, bu n'ebe [[Asia]]. Na otu aka ya no ala [[Africa]], na out aka ozo no ala ''[[Australia]]''. O no n'elu [[Antarctica]] na [[Southern Ocean]].
== Lee nke ozo == * [[Southern Ocean]]
[[Òtù:Geography]]

'''2007''' bu afo asaa na ''century'' nkena buru ''21st century''.
==Ihe mere na 2007== ===Eprel=== * 21 Eprel - A bidoro ''elections'' na [[Naigeria]] ta e mee elect president ozo. ===Mee=== * 29 Mee - Onye meriri na ''presidential election'' nde Naigeria nwetere office. ==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru==
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
[[Òtù:Íchié 21]]

{{Ngwómárí Obodo |native_name = {{lang|gez|2={{evukwala|የኢትዮጵያ ፌዴራላዊ
ዲሞክራሲያዊ ሪፐብሊክ}}}}
''{{gbanw|gez|ye-Ītyōṗṗyā Fēdēralāwī Dīmōkrāsīyāwī Rīpeblīk}}'' |conventional_long_name = Obodo Ochíchìíwú Ethiopia |common_name = Ethiopia |image_flag = Flag of Ethiopia.svg |image_coat = Coat of arms of Ethiopia.svg | symbol_type = Ihü |image_map = Ethiopia in its region.svg |capital = [[Addis Ababa]] |asusu_obodo = [[Amhara]] |leader_title1 = [[President]] |leader_title2 = [[Prime Minister]] |leader_name1 = [[Mulatu Teshome Wirtu]] |leader_name2 = [[Haile Mariam Desalegn]] }} '''Ethiopia''' bu obodo nde oji no na [[Afrịka]]. Isi oche ya bu [[Addis Ababa]]. Imerime wo bu nde ekpere chi [[Christian]], ufodi bu ndi [[Islam]] ma ndi Jew. Ha na su asusu abwo nke ukwu, asusu olu ana-kpo ''Oromo'' na ''Amhara''. == Lee nke ozo == * [[Afrịka]] [[Òtù:Ala no n'ime Afrịka]]

[[Ákwúkwó orünotu:WM2006 0060.jpg|thumb|160px|right|Jimmy Donal "Jimbo" Wales]]
[[Usòrò:2014-03-14 CeBIT Global Conferences, Jimmy Wales, Founder Wikipedia, (26) On stage showing the world for Wikipedia Zero (500 millions), while Brent Goff is still listening.jpg|thumb|Jimmy Wales 2014 on ''[[CeBIT]] Global Conferences'', [[Wikipedia Zero]]]]
'''Jimmy Wales''' bu onye bidoro Wikipedia. Ana-kpo ya ''benevolent dictator'' mgbe ufodu.

revision.text:
[[Usòrò:Male.svg|thumb|125px|right|Shield na spear]] Onye '''nwoke''' bu otu n'ime abwo ndi madu nwere ike bu. Onye bu nwoke e nweghi ike di ime, mu tata.
Umu nwoke e nweghi ike di ime, muta nwa. Nime ezi na ulo, nwoke bu di, oburu na amuta nwa, nwoke bu nna ma obu papa ==Lee nke ozo== Nwoke = Nwa + Oke Nwa = a child Oke = Male
Na asusu Igbo, O buru na 'vowelu' abua abiakota onu na otu mkpuru okwu, otu n'ime ha na 'elo' nke ozo. Ya mere na mgbe ana ede Nwoke (Nwa+oke), 'O' na elo 'A'... Nwoke bu isi nwa n'ala Igbo. N'oge gbuo, umu nwoke na enwe ihe n'ile Nna ha kpatara na ndu ya.
Nwoke = male child.
* [[Nwanyi]] * [[Nwanna]]
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
[[Òtù:Madu]]

revision.text:
{{Íshí nke önwa}}
Na iguafọ ''Gregorian'', '''Maachị''' bu onwa ato na afo, bu otu onwa n'ime asaa nwere ubochi ruru 31 (''iri ato na otu''). Na mgbe gara-aga, Maachị bula onwa mbu, site na afo nwela onwa iri. Mgbe ekere ''[[Jenụwarị]]'' na ''[[Febrụwarị]]'', Maachị a-da, mee afo nwere onwa iri na abuo.
==Ihe a neme na Maachị== * ''[[:en:International Womens Day|Ubochi nke Nwanyi-nile n'Uwa]]'' - [[8 Maachị]] * ''Ides of Maachị'' - [[15 Maachị]] (oge e buru nwoke [[eze]] nke [[ndi ocha]], nke ana-kpo [[Julius Caesar]] * ''[[:en:Good Friday|Friday nk'oma]]'' - (n'oyu Friday no n'etiti [[20 Maachị]] ru [[23 Eprel]])
[[Òtù:Maachị]]

{{Íshí nke önwa}}
Na iguafọr ''Gregorian'', '''Disemba''' bu onwa iri na abuo, na afo, bu otu onwa n'ime asaa nwere ubochi ruru 31 (''iri ato na otu'') n'ime wo. Na mgbe gara-aga, Disemba bula onwa iri, site na afo nwela onwa iri. Afo nwere onwa iri na abuo ubochi kena.
Disemba bu kwaa onwa no na azu dị mee kpochie afo nile.
[[Òtù:Disemba]]

revision.text:
1 Juun bu ubochi mbu na onwa ana kpo [[Juun]]. Na ''Gregorian'' calender, 1 Juun bu ubochi nke 152<sup>nd</sup> na afo (''non-leap year''), bu ubochi nke 153<sup>rd</sup> mgbe afo ahu bu ''leap year''. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 213 tupu afo nkena agwu.
==Ihe mere na 1 Juun== ===Holiday's=== * Children's Day na obodo ozo n'abughi [[Naigeria]].

revision.text:
'''''Coordinated Universal Time''''' na bekee, ('''UTC'''), bu otu adi-iji amata ihe oge bu n'elu uwa nile. O bu taa ndi mmadu no n'uwa nwe ọtu ha nwere-ike ima oge ma mgbe ha gara ogbozo. Ndi ''[[:en:International Atomic Time|International Atomic Time]]'' bu ndi n'eleekotawa machine nke n'emee oge uwa di mma. {| class="toccolours" style="margin: .5em .5em .5em .5em; float: right;" |+ Compromise abbreviation ! source !! abbreviation |- | English || CUT (coordinated universal time) |- | French || TUC (temps universel coordonné) |- | compromise || UTC |} Ha na guta ihe oge bu mgbe ha n'eleewa ọtu [[uwa]] di-igba anyawu buru-buru, ma otu onwa na gba anyi buru-buru. Ikwesiri ma ''time zone'' i-no la, gi tinye m'obu mee nwefu oke ikwesiri. {{selfref|1=
Example: '''{{CURRENTDAYNAME}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}-{{CURRENTMONTH}}-{{CURRENTDAY2}} T {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC'''
}} Ndi no la ''New York'' kwesiri '''nwefu ise''' na oge no n'elu. Ndi no na ''[[Naigeria]]'' kwesiri '''tinye otu'''. == Links na aga n'ezi == * [http://www.worldtimeserver.co World Time Server] [[fi:Aikajärjestelmä#UTC]]

'''[{{fullurl:Wikipedia:Request for Bot status/Thijs-TXiKi-Yona|action=edit}} Voice your opinion]''' '''(2/0/0); Scheduled to end 22:07, [[Isii|6]] [[June]], [[2007]] (UTC)'''
These interwiki-link bots are making [[special:recentchanges]] very hard to read, but if they had bot flags they would all be hidden, leaving only real users edits. Therefore, I propose that all three receive bot flags. [[User:Picaroon9288|Picaroon]] [[User talk:Picaroon9288|(Talk)]] 22:07, 31 May 2007 (UTC) ---- # '''Support''' -- these bots have been making alot of edits to igwiki (maybe [[User:Robbot]] too). Giving them bot-status will be the right thing. Perhaps later on, we might even get an anti-vandalism bot. -- [[User:Kerowren|Kerowren]] <sup>([[User talk:Kerowren|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Kerowren|contribs]])</sup> 16:12, 1 June 2007 (UTC) #:Yes, Robbot too. I missed it the first time. Seeing as this has passed closing time I will now go request flags for all four on meta. [[User:Picaroon9288|Picaroon]] [[User talk:Picaroon9288|(Talk)]] 22:57, 6 June 2007 (UTC) #::[[User:Escarbot|Escarbot]] too. [[User:Picaroon9288|Picaroon]] [[User talk:Picaroon9288|(Talk)]] 23:01, 6 June 2007 (UTC) #:::I have made the request, and added [[User:JAnDbot|JAnDbot]] too. These all have bot flags on many other wikis, and we know all they are going to do is add and remove and modify interwiki links, so I don't think we need separate requests for these later three. [[User:Picaroon9288|Picaroon]] [[User talk:Picaroon9288|(Talk)]] 23:28, 6 June 2007 (UTC)

{{Infobox president |name=General Ibrahim Badamosi Babangida |nationality=Nigerian |image= |order=8th [[President of Nigeria]] |term_start=[[27 Ọgọọst ]], [[1985]] |term_end=[[27 Ọgọọst ]], [[1993]] |predecessor=[[Muhammadu Buhari]] |successor=[[Ernest Shonekan]] |birth_date=[[17 Ọgọọst ]], [[1941]] |birth_place=[[Minna]], [[Nigeria]] |dead=alive |spouse= |party=none (millitary) |vicepresident= |religion= }}
General Ibrahim Badamosi Babangida
8th [[President of Nigeria]]
'''In office'''
[[27 Ọgọọst]], [[1985]] - [[27 Ọgọọst]], [[1993]]
Preceded by [[Muhammadu Buhari]]
Succeeded by [[Ernest Shonekan]]
Born [[17 Ọgọọst]], [[1941]]
[[Minna]], [[Niger State]], [[Nigeria]]
Political party none (military)
Religion [[Islam]]
General '''Ibrahim Badamosi Babangida''', onye nde mmadu na kpo '''IBB''', amuru [[17 Ọgọọst]], [[1941]], bula onye ishi army [[Naigeria]], mere onwe ya ishi government Naigeria na ''coup'' mere [[Ọgọọst]] [[1985]]. Obu onye Gwarri. Babangida nwetere ishi oche Naigeria, si, hagi mee obodo ha nwe elections, e nweta onye gi bu onye president ala Naigeria. Mgbe e mere ya, ha tufu ya, si o bughi nke eziokwu, ndi mmadu e shi ike, si Babangida kwesiri ifu la government Naigeria. Nke bu ihe mere Babangida a hafu office, tinye [[Ernest Shonekan]] na ya ta o lekotawa Naigeria du mgbe ndi madu e mee election nke president. ==Lee nke ozo== * [[Ernest Shonekan]] * [[Sani Abacha]] ==Links na aga n'ezi== * [http://www.babangida.com Ibrahim Babangida dedicated website] [[Òtù:President of Naigeria]]

'''2005''' bu afo gara-aga. Obu afo ise na 21st century, bu afo agugu 2005 n'oge bidoro na [[1|1 AD]].
==Ihe mere na 2005== ===Ọktoba=== * [[Ọktoba]] 22 - ''[[Belleview Airline Flight 210]]'' a gba oku, da, mgbe onola n'elu; ndi mmadu 117 a wu. ===Disemba=== * [[Disemba]] 9 - Emere [[Goodluck Jonathan]] governor Bayelsa State na [[Naigeria]]. ==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru== ===Ọgọọst=== * [[Ọgọọst]] 7 - ''[[:en:Peter Jennings|Peter Jennings]]'', onye TV reporter na America a muru na [[Canada]], wuru.
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
[[Òtù:Íchié 21]]

'''2003''' bu afo gara-aga. Obu afo ato na onu agugu n'ime 21st century, bu ke agugu 2003 na oge bidoro [[1|1st AD]].
==Ihe mere na 2003== ===Maachị=== * [[Maachị]] - Nwoke ana-kpo ''Sheldon Rampton'' e che aha enyere ''[[Wikimedia]]''. ===Juun=== * [[20 Juun]] - E bido [[Wikimedia Foundation]] ta o lekotawa [[Wikipedia]] na nwanne ya. ===Julaị=== * [[10 Julaị]] - E bido [[Wikibooks]] na [[Wikiquote]]. ===Novemba=== * [[24 Novemba]] - E bido [[Wikisource]]. ==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru== ===Juun=== * '''26 Juun''' - Marc-Vivien Foé, onye na ku [[football]] n'ebe [[Cameroon]] a wuo.
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
[[Òtù:Íchié 21]]

'''1998''' bu afo gara-aga. O no na onu agugu abuo eru afo [[2000]] di bido 21st century.
==Ihe mere na 1998== ===Novemba=== * 1 Novemba - Ndi [[Europe]] e bido ''[[:en:European Court of Human Rights|European Court of Human Rights]]'' hawa ta ha lekota ndi wo. ==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru== ===Juun=== * 8 Juun - General [[Sani Abacha]], onye [[President of Naigeria|president Naigeria]] a wuo mgbe o nwere ''heart attack''.

'''Ernest Shonekan''' bula onye [[Ibrahim Babangida]] hapuru office [[President of Naigeria|president Naigeria]] na 26 Ọgọọst , [[1993]], mgbe ndi mmadu mere ya vote. Ha nwetere office ahu, ya no nga onwa ato mgbe [[Sani Abacha]] biara na army, chufu ya. O si Ogun state di na odida anyanwu Naigeria.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Ibrahim Babangida]] * [[Sani Abacha]]

revision.text:
'''Liberalism''' bu echiche kuru ihe na: ndi mmadu nile n'uwa nwere oke ha si di ndu n'onwu ya, n' nwere ndi government gwa-wa ya ihe okwesiri mee mgbe nile. Kama nye ndi mmadu nsobu, government kwesiri nye ndi onwe ya otu ha nwere ike bi ndu nmara nma, no nga ta o wefu ndi joro njo.
Ndi n'ebi na echiche nkea bu ndi ana-kpo ''Liberal (s)''. Ma ubochi ke, ndi Liberal di si ndi mmadu nwere kwaa ike ha nwere-ike ji nye ndi n'aweghi iri aka. Ha si ta ndi mmadu mee ihe ha nwere ike mee ta ndi mmadu lile no n'uwa di mma.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Moderate]] * [[Conservative]]
[[Òtù:Che]]

revision.text:
[[Usòrò:Kolanut.jpg|framed|right|Kola nut]] '''Ojị''' na ama ndi [[Ndi Igbo|Igbo]] bu he adi wo iji ka ndi biara na ulo wo oji. Oji na di k'ilu. Ndi [[nwoke]] n'eri ya ma ndi [[nwanyi]] ufodu mgbe ha choro.
Ubochi na, anyi ma onwere ike mee onye di ri ya nnuku nwe cancer, maka onwere miri ojo ana-kpo ''N-[[:en:nitroso|nitroso]]''. Na ala [[Naigeria]], ebe imerime mmadu di ta ya, ha ne nwe cancer na onu ma na afo.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Ndi Igbo]] * [[Ube]]
[[Òtù:Mkpuru osisi]] [[Òtù:Nri]]

revision.text:
[[Usòrò:MediaWiki-smaller-logo.png|thumb|right|Logo MediaWiki]] '''MediaWiki''' bu aha ana-kpo program [[Wikipedia]] di gba na. Ndi [[Wikimedia Foundation]], nde di lekota Wikipedia, bu nde di de ya. Ade wa ya na asusu programming ana-kpo PHP. Dika Wikipedia, inwere ike nweta nke gi na akwughi ugwo, maka adi ime MediaWiki e release na ihe ana-kpo [[:en:GNU General Public License|GNU General Public License]].
MediaWiki di kwe ndi mmadu a de he na website di gba na ya, mgbe onye nwe ya kwesi. Obu he mere Wikipedia a ga elu.
== Lee nke ozo == * [[Wiki]]

'''1985''' bu afo gara-aga. Obu afo agugu 1985 n'oge bidoro na [[1|1 AD]].
==Ihe mere na 1985== ===Ọgọọst=== * [[27 Ọgọọst]] - General '''[[Ibrahim Babangida]]''' a mee coup, wefu government [[Naigeria]], mee onwe ya ishi ya. ==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru==

revision.text:
[[Ákwúkwó orünotu:SiegeofAntioch.jpeg|thumb|250px|right|Ogu a luru ebe Antioch]] Ihe ana-kpo '''Crusades''' bu agha ano ndi [[Christians]] ma ndi [[Muslim]] luru na oge 1095 ru 1291. O bidoro mgbe ndi Christian choro uzo ha nwere ike wefu ndi [[Islam]] na ala wo di kpo ''Holy Land'' (ebe [[Jerusalem]] ma [[Israel]]), ebe ndi [[Jews]] binala, mgbe gara-aga. Ha luo ogu wo, luo-luo, ndi [[Islam]] a nonye.
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Efefe Kraịst]] * [[Áláküba]]
[[Òtù:Éféfé Kraist]]

[[Usòrò:Emblem of Jerusalem.svg|thumb|200px|left]] [[Usòrò:Jerusalem infobox image.JPG|thumb|300px|left]] [[Usòrò:Jerusalem Dome of the rock BW 14.JPG|thumb|275px|Jerusalem na Mount Olives]] '''Jerusalem''' bu obodo okeye no n'ime ala ana-kpo [[Israel]]. Ndi [[Jew]], [[Christian]], na [[Muslim]] che obu ebe nso. Ndi Christian ma ndi Islam luru ogu ana-kpo ''the [[Crusades]]'' ebe na. Na oge nka, ndi Jew ma ndi Islam nwere nsobu site ebe na.
== Lee nke ozo == * [[Israel]]

==Lee nke ozo== * [[United States of Amerika]]
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
[[Òtù:United States of Amerika]]

[[Usòrò:AmericaAfrica.svg|thumb|200px|right]] '''African American''', ma ha na kpo ha '''Black American''', bu oke ana mata [[ndi oji]] bi n' [[United States of Amerika|Amerikạ]], m'obu nde nne na nna ha biara na afo gara-aga, amuo ha ebe a, ma o bụ ndi nwẹtẹrẹ akwukwo obịbị na Amerika.
Na oge gara-aga, ndi oji bi n' America bu ndi ohu ndi ocha gbatara n'Afrika kpobata ha n'Amerika. A kwusiri hena mgbe ndi govumenti ( Ochichi) America deghariri Iwu-ala ha(Constitution) nke ugboro Iri na-ato ''[[:en:Thirteenth Ammendment|Thirteenth Ammendment]]'' na ''[[:en:Constitution|Constitution]]'' .
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Ndi oji]] * [[Njikota Obodo Amerika]]
[[Òtù:United States of Amerika]]

revision.text:
[[Usòrò:Nupedia.jpg|300px|right]]‎ '''Nupedia''' bula encyclopedia nola na [[Internet]]. Dika Wikipedia, [[Jimmy Wales]] bula otu madu bidoro ya, ha na [[Larry Sanger]]. Na 15 Jenụwarị, na afo [[2001]], ha hapuru Nupedia bido Wikipedia, nwere he nile nola n'ebee tinye na Wikipedia nke ndi bekee. Nupedia kpochiri uzo ya na [[Septemba]] [[2003]].
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Wikipedia]]
==Keezi njikọ== * [http://nupedia.wikia.com Nupedia]

[[Usòrò:Larry Sanger.jpg|thumb|210px|right]] '''Larry Sanger''' bula enyi Jimmy Wales. Ya na nwoke ahu bu nde bidoro [[Wikipedia]]. Mbu ha bido Wikipedia, ha nwela encyclopedia nola na Internet, adila kpo [[Nupedia]].
Na [[Maachị]] 15, [[2007]], Larry Sanger bidoro encyclopedia ozo ana-kpo [[:en:Citizendium|Citizendium]].
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Jimmy Wales]] * [[Nupedia]]
[[Òtù:Wikipedia]] [[Òtù:Ndi Amerika]]

revision.text:
[[Ákwúkwó orünotu:Internet map 1024.jpg|thumb|200px|right|Intanet na obere]] '''Intanet''' bu oke ''network'' ukwu n'uwa dika otu na dibe mgbu. Nde ''Department of Defense'' na government [[United States|Emerika]] bu nde bidoro Internet mgbe ha dila kpo ya ARPANET. Obu Internet mere anyi nwe ike ihu he m'obu iku la onye madu no n'ebe ozo n'uwa.
==Links n'aga n'ezi==
[[Òtù:Úwà]]
[http://schluesseldienst-in-duisburg.de/ Schlüsseldienst Duisburg]

revision.text:
[[Usòrò:Primemeridian.jpg|thumbnail|250px|right|Line no n'etiti di gba elu na ala bu Prime Meridian. Adi ji nde line ozo guzie ma ''longitude'' kwaa. Nde adi-guzie ji adi ji mata [[latitude]].]]
'''''Longitude''''' bu oluwa bekee ana mata mgbe he no na ''Owuwu'' n'uwa, ma mgbe ono na ''Odida''. Adi mata ''longitude-u'' wo mgbe elewa ma ono n'aka iri m'ono na aka-ikpa ihe ana-kpo ''Prime Meridian'', line eji kawasi uwa n'etiti, gbara ya ma elu ala ya (ebe [[Arctic]]) ru okpuru ala ya (ebe [[Antarctica]]). Ihe no na aka-iri gi mgbe ilewa prime meridian uwa nwere longitude no na ''East''. Ihe no na aka-ikpa gi nwere longitude no na ''West''.
== Lee nke ozo == * [[Latitude]]
[[Òtù:Úwà]]

revision.comment: Clean up, month names etc. using [[Project:AWB|AWB]]
revision.text:
[[Usòrò:World map with equator.svg|thumb|250px|right|Line no n'etiti nke adi-guzie bu Equator. Adi ji nde line ozo adi-guzie ma ''latitude'' kwaa. Nde di guzie bu nke adi ji mata [[longitude]].]]
'''''Latitude''''' bu oluwa bekee ana mata mgbe he no na ''North'' n'uwa, ma mgbe ono na ''South''. Adi mata ''latitude-u'' wo mgbe elewa ma ono n'elu m'ono n'okpuru ihe ana-kpo ''Prime Meridian'', line eji kawasi uwa n'etiti. Ihe no n'elu nwere latitude no na ''North''. Ihe no n'okpuru nwere latitude no na ''South''.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Longitude]]
[[Òtù:Úwà]]

revision.text:
20 Juun bu ubochi nke 20th (''iri abuo'') na onwa ana kpo [[Juun]]. Na ''Gregorian'' calender, 20 Juun bu ubochi nke 171<sup>st</sup> na afo (''non-leap year''), bu ubochi nke 172<sup>nd</sup> mgbe afo ahu bu ''leap year''. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 194 tupu afo nkena agwu.
==Ihe mere na 20 Juun== * [[2003]] - [[Jimmy Wales]] mere [[Wikimedia Foundation]] ta olekota [[Wikipedia]] na nwanne ya.
==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru==

'''[{{fullurl:Wikipedia:Request for Bot status/Byrialbot|action=edit}} Voice your opinion]''' '''(1/0/0); Scheduled to end 22:07, 29 [[June]], [[2007]] (UTC)'''
Hello! I ask for permission to run my interwiki bot [[User:Byrialbot|Byrialbot]] at this wiki, and possibly get a bot flag for it. * Operator: [[User:Byrial]] * Operator's home project: [[:da:User:Byrial]] * Purpose: Interwiki * Have bot flag at: ar:, bs:, cs:, da:, de:, en:, eo:, fo:, fr:, he:, hu:, id:, io:, is:, it:, ka:, lb:, li:, lt:, ms:, nds:, nn:, no:, pt:, simple:, sv:, uk:, vo: * Details: Interwiki using Pywikipediabot starting from da:, nn:, no: and sv:. It mostly runs manually assisted and I try to solve found interwiki conflicts when I can. It is not running yet as it waits for permission. Please tell if you like to see any test edits. Thank you! [[User:Byrial|Byrial]] 20:50, 19 June 2007 (UTC) ---- # {{Accept|<s>We have bots but I would like to see edits this one would make, so perhaps some tests.</s> Why not. -- [[User talk:Kerowren|Kerowren]] <sup>([[User talk:Kerowren|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Kerowren|contribs]])</sup> 20:27, 21 June 2007 (UTC) }} :* OK, I will do test edits. [[User:Byrial|Byrial]] 09:22, 22 June 2007 (UTC) :* As you only have about 200 articles now in this Wikipedia, my bot would normally not make many changes here when it starts from Danish pages. So in order to produce some test edits quickly, I let start it from articles here today. [[User:Byrial|Byrial]] 11:55, 23 June 2007 (UTC)

revision.text: '''[{{fullurl:Wikipedia:Request for Bot status/Purbo T|action=edit}} Voice your opinion]''' '''(1/0/0) Scheduled to end 22:07, 29 [[June]], [[2007]] (UTC)''' I kindly request the bot flag for the bot below: * Botmaster: [[User:Purodha|Purodha]] aka [[:ksh:User:Purodha]] ([[:ksh:User talk:Purodha|talk]]) * Bot's name: [[:User:Purbo T|Purbo T]] ([[Special:Contributions/Purbo T|contributions]]) * Current bot flags on other wikipedias: [[:am:User:Purbo T|am]], [[:ku:User:Purbo T|ku]], [[:ksh:User:Purbo T|ksh]], [[:nds:User:Purbo T|nds]], pending: [[:ar:User:Purbo T|ar]], [[:bn:User:Purbo T|bn]], [[:en:User:Purbo T|en]], self-approved: [[:simple:User:Purbo T|simple]], there are likely more to come… * Purpose: interwiki link maintainance, based on the home [[:ksh:|Wikipedia of Ripuarian languages]], most predominantly in manual-controlled mode. * Technical details: using the standard pywikipedia framework, updated to newest version daily, developing an interactive web based on replicated wikipedia data bases for feeding the bot. * I have been test-driving the bot program for few instances under my normal user account, [[:User:Purodha|Purodha]] ([[Special:Contributions/Purodha|contributions]]), during the recent days. --[[User:Purbo T|Purbo T]] 23:16, 22 June 2007 (UTC) ---- # [[Image:Symbol_support_vote.svg|16px]] '''Support''' so as to rm recentchanges clutter (this bot will fill up [[Wikipedia:Bots|quota]]). -- [[User talk:Kerowren|Kerowren]] ([[User talk:Kerowren|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Kerowren|contribs]]) 21:29, 26 June 2007 (UTC)

'''Peter Obi''' (amuru 19 [[Julaị]] 1961) bu onye governor [[Anambra State]] na ala [[Naigeria]]. Na [[Novemba]] [[Abuo|2]], n'afo [[2006]], achufuru ya na office governor, si ha mere ihe ojo. Mgbe ha gara na Supreme Court, si ha kuzie ya ihe mere, emerelachi ya onye governor.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Virginia Etiaba]] * [[List of Nigerian state governors|Nde ''governor'' states no na Naigeria]]
{{DEFAULTSORT:Obi, Peter}} [[Òtù:Governor of a Nigerian State]]

'''Dr. Sam Egwu''' (amuru [[20 Juun]] 1954) bula onye governor [[Ebonyi State]] na [[Naigeria]], [[29 Mee]] [[1999]] ru [[29 Mee]], [[2007]]. Obu onye [[People's Democratic Party]] (PDP), nke nwetere vote hiri nne na election nke 2007.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Martin Elechi]] * [[List of Nigerian state governors|Nde ''governor'' states no na Naigeria]]
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
{{DEFAULTSORT:Egwu, Sam}} [[Òtù:Governor of a Nigerian State]]

'''Martin Elechi''' bu onye bu governor na [[Ebonyi State]] na [[Naigeria]]. Ha nwetere office ahu na 29 Mee 2007. Obu onye [[People's Democratic Party]] (PDP).
Take time and share the money ok Tio * [[Sam Egwu]] * [[List of Nigerian state governors|Nde ''governor'' states no na Naigeria]]

revision.comment: global bots allowed per [[Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval#Global_bots]]
revision.text:
{{botnav}}
This wiki uses the [[m:bot policy|standard bot policy]], and allows [[m:bot policy#Global_bots|global bots]] and [[m:bot policy#Automatic_approval|automatic approval of certain types of bots]]. Other bots should apply on [[Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval]], and then [[m:Steward requests/Bot status|request access]] from a steward if there is no objection.
However, please be aware that due to the relatively small size of this wiki, all unregistered bots running without permission may be banned. Unregistered bots are allowed <u>100</u> courtesy edits prior. '''Registered''' bots that have been inactive for '''6''' months may be de-botted to relieve quota.

revision.comment: /* Lee nke ozo */clean up, replaced: {{-stub}} → {{ÉdéNtạ}} using [[Project:AWB|AWB]]
revision.text:
'''Eba''' bu aha ana-kpo [[gari]] emerre-emerre, gba miri oku ta erie ya na ofe. [[Ndi Igbo]] n'eri eba na nke ukwu, ma ndi [[Ijebu]], otu [[ndi Yoruba]]. Otu ofe ndi Igbo n'eri m'eba bu ofe-egusi.
==Maka ya== Eba bu gari emere eme n'ala Igbo. Ndi Yoruba kporo ya eba. A bia n'ala Igbo, ofe e ji eri eba erika. Eji ofe achi, ofe ede, ofe onugbu,apucheka na akpurata eri eba. Mana ndi akachasi eri gunyere egusi na ogbono ma obukwan ofe okro. Na oge gboo ndi okenye anaghi ekwe eri gari n'ala Igbo. Ha na-asi na obu naani umu akwukwo na- eri gari. Mana ugbua onye obula na-erizi ya. Okenye ma nwatakiri. Gari atoka ma ejiri ofe a kworo aka sie were na-eri ya. Ofe e ji eri ya a na-etinye ya azu, okporoko, anu ewu, anu efi ma obu anu nchi.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Garri]] * [[Fufu]]
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
[[Òtù:Nri]]

'''1 Febrụwarị''' bu ubochi nke 1st (''nke mbụ'') na onwa ana kpo [[Febrụwarị]]. Na ''Gregorian'' calender, 1 Febrụwarị bu ubochi nke 32nd na afo. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 333 (334 na afo nke ana-kpo leap-year) du mgbe afo na agwu.
==Ihe mere na 1 Febrụwarị==
==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru==
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
[[Òtù:Febrụwarị]]

'''1 Eprel''' bu ubochi nke 1st (''nke mbụ'') na onwa ana kpo [[Eprel]]. Na ''Gregorian'' calender, 1 Eprel bu ubochi nke 91st (92nd na afo nke ana-kpo ''leap year'') na afo. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 274 du mgbe afo na agwu.
==Ihe mere na 1 Eprel==
==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru==

[[Òtù:Eprel]]

{{IguafọrÖnwa-ụzụ-Alụsị|float=right}}
'''Önwa mbu 3''' bu ubochi nke ato na onwa ana-kpo [[Jenụwarị]]. Obukwa nke ato na afo nile. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 362 (363 na afo ana-kpo ''leap year'') du mgbe afo na agwu.
==Ihe mere na Önwa mbu 3== * 1848 - Obodo nke Africa ana kpo [[Liberia]], enweta president nke mbu ya. ==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru==
[[Òtù:Önwa mbu]]

revision.comment: Clean up, month names etc. using [[Project:AWB|AWB]]
revision.text:
3 Juun bu ubochi nke ato na onwa ana kpo [[Juun]]. Na ''Gregorian'' calender, 3 Juun bu ubochi nke 154<sup>th</sup> (155<sup>th</sup> na afo nke ana-kpo ''leap year'') na afo. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 211 du mgbe afo na agwu .
==Ihe mere na 3 Juun==
==Onye amuru== * [[1968]] - Amuru Samantha Sprackling, onye ogu uri Nigeria ==Onye wuru==
[[Òtù:Önwa ishií]]

'''3 Disemba''' bu ubochi nke 3rd (''nke atọ'') na onwa ana kpo [[Disemba]]. Na ''Gregorian'' calender, 3 Disemba bu ubochi nke 337th (338th na afo nke ana-kpo ''leap year'') na afo. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 28 du mgbe afo na agwu.
==Ihe mere na 3 Disemba==
==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru==
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
[[Òtù:Disemba]]

{{template doc page transcluded}} {{template doc page viewed directly}} == Syntax == 
{{Collapsible list
|title       = 
|title_style = (optional)
|list_style  = (optional)
|1           = First item of list
|2           = Second item of list
|3           = Third item of list
|...
}}
== Example == 
{{Collapsible list |title=[[:Category:Ala no n'ime Africa]] |[[Bịafra]] |[[Cameroon]] |[[Ethiopia]] |[[Niger]] |[[Naigeria]]}}
{{Collapsible list |title=[[:Category:Ala no n'ime Africa|Ala no n'ime Africa]] |[[Bịafra]] |[[Cameroon]] |[[Ethiopia]] |[[Niger]] |[[Naigeria]]}}

revision.text:
{{template doc page transcluded}}{{template doc page viewed directly}} Template to aid switching the font-size used for a text string.
; Syntax {{resize|''N''|''text''}}  or  {{resize|''text''}}
''N'' specifies a size, such as "90%", "1.2em", etc. For the default case (the second above), ''N'' is set to "90%".
; Examples {| style="background:transparent;" | {{resize|1.2em|This text is 0.2em larger than normal}}    | {{resize|1.2em|This text is 0.2em larger than normal}} |- | {{resize|80%|This text is 80% normal size}} | {{resize|80%|This text is 80% normal size}} |- | {{resize|This text defaults to 90% normal size}} | {{resize|This text defaults to 90% normal size}} |} ===Alternate=== {{tlp|smaller|''Text''}} = {{tlp|resize|''Text''}} (i.e. ''Text'' will appear at 90% normal size.) [[Category:Formatting templates|{{PAGENAME}}]]

revision.comment: The file [[:Image:Hcard-microformat-button.png]] has been removed, as it has been deleted by [[:commons:User:O]]: ''[[w:commons:Commons:Deletion requests/Microformat logos|licence used is incompatible with Commons]]''. ''[[m:User:CommonsDelinker|Tran
revision.text:
The HTML mark up produced by this template includes an [[:en:HCard| hCard microformat]], which makes the place-name and location [[:en:Parsing|parsable]] by computers, either acting automatically to catalogue article across Wikipedia, or via a browser tool operated by a person, to (for example) add the subject to an address book. For more information about the use of [[microformat]]s on Wikipedia, please see [[:en:WP:UF|the microformat project]].
hCard uses HTML classes including: {{flatlist}} *"adr" *"county-name" *"fn" *"label" *"locality" *"nickname" *"note" *"org" *"vcard" {{endflatlist}}
'''Please do not rename or remove these classes.'''
[[Category:Templates generating hCards|{{PAGENAME}}]]

{{IguafọrÖnwa-ụzụ-Alụsị|float=right}}
'''Önwa mbu 20''' bu ubochi nke 20th (''iri abuo'') na onwa ana kpo [[Jenụwarị]] ma na afo nile. Na ''Gregorian'' calender, anyi nwere agugu ubochi 345 (346 na afo nke ana-kpo ''leap-year'') du mgbe afo na agwu.
==Ihe mere na Önwa mbu 20==
==Onye amuru== * [[1950]] - Mahamane Ousmane, onye President [[Niger]]
==Onye wuru==
[[Òtù:Önwa mbu]]

'''20 Disemba''' bu ubochi nke 20th (''nke iri abụọ '') na onwa ana kpo [[Disemba]]. Na ''Gregorian'' calender, 20 Disemba bu ubochi nke 354th (355th na afo nke ana-kpo ''leap year'') na afo. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 11 du mgbe afo na agwu.
==Ihe mere na 20 Disemba==
==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru==
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
[[Òtù:Disemba]]

{{IguafọrÖnwa-ụzụ-Alụsị|float=right}}
'''Önwa mbu 27''' bu ubochi nke 27th (''iri abuo na asaa'') na onwa ana kpo [[Jenụwarị]] ma na afo nile. Na ''Gregorian'' calender, anyi nwere agugu ubochi 338 (339 na afo nke ana-kpo ''leap-year'') du mgbe afo na agwu.
==Ihe mere na Önwa mbu 27== * [[1996]] - Colonel [[Ibrahim Baré Maïnassara]], onye army, ewefu Mahamane Ousmane, onye ndi Niger mere elect ta obu president. * [[2002]] - Oku bomb gbara ebe nde military [[Naigeria]] tinyere egbe ma bombu wo, ebu 1,000 na [[Lagos]].
==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru==
[[Òtù:Önwa mbu]]

'''27 Eprel''' bu ubochi nke 27th (''nke iri abụọ na asaa'') na onwa ana kpo [[Eprel]]. Na ''Gregorian'' calender, 27 Eprel bu ubochi nke 117th (118th na afo nke ana-kpo ''leap year'') na afo. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 248 du mgbe afo na agwu.
==Ihe mere na 27 Eprel==
==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru==
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
[[Òtù:Eprel]]

revision.comment: Clean up, month names etc. using [[Project:AWB|AWB]]
revision.text:
'''Önwa ishií 27''' bu ubochi nke 27th (iri abuo na asaa) na onwa ana kpo [[Juun]]. Na ''Gregorian'' calender, 27 Juun bu ubochi nke 178<sup>th</sup> na afo (''non-leap year'') nile, bu ubochi nke 179<sup>th</sup> mgbe afo ahu bu nke ''leap year''. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 187 du mgbe afo na agwu.
==Ihe mere na Önwa ishií 27==
==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru== * 1773 - [[Mentewab]], lolo ndi [[Ethiopia]].
[[Òtù:Önwa ishií]]

'''27 Disemba''' bu ubochi nke 27th (''nke iri abụọ na asaa'') na onwa ana kpo [[Disemba]]. Na ''Gregorian'' calender, 27 Disemba bu ubochi nke 361st (362nd na afo nke ana-kpo ''leap year'') na afo. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 4 du mgbe afo na agwu.
==Ihe mere na 27 Disemba==
==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru==
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
[[Òtù:Disemba]]

{{Whatlinkshere|Infobox US Cabinet official}} * {{Whatlinkshere|Infobox US Chief Justice}} * {{Whatlinkshere|Infobox US Territorial Governor}} * {{Whatlinkshere|Infobox Vice President}} |} ==Microformat== {{UF-hcard-person}} ==Usage== Paste the code for the relevant office and then add the [[#Personal data|personal data]] to the bottom. There are no required fields and some fields will not appear when others are in use. For instructions on how to implement multiple terms, see [[Template:Infobox Officeholder/example#Multiple terms|this page]]. ===General office=== {{For|examples of this code in use|Template:Infobox Officeholder/example#General office}} 
{{Infobox Officeholder
| honorific-prefix    =
| name                =
| honorific-suffix    =
| image               =
| imagesize           =
| smallimage          =
| caption             =
| order               =
| office              =
| term_start          =
| term_end            =
| vicepresident       =
| viceprimeminister   =
| deputy              =
| lieutenant          =
| monarch             =
| president           =
| primeminister       =
| governor            =
| governor-general    =
| governor_general    =
| succeeding          =
| predecessor         =
| successor           =
| constituency        =
| majority            =

| office2             =
| term_start2         =
| term_end2           =
| vicepresident2      =
| viceprimeminister2  =
| deputy2             =
| lieutenant2         =
| monarch2            =
| president2          =
| primeminister2      =
| governor2           =
| succeeding2         =
| predecessor2        =
| successor2          =
| constituency2       =
| majority2           =

revision.comment: The file [[:Image:Hcard-microformat-button.png]] has been removed, as it has been deleted by [[:commons:User:O]]: ''[[w:commons:Commons:Deletion requests/Microformat logos|licence used is incompatible with Commons]]''. ''[[m:User:CommonsDelinker|Tran
revision.text:
The HTML mark up produced by this template includes an [[HCard|hCard microformat]], which makes the person's details [[Parsing|parsable]] by computers, either acting automatically to catalogue article across Wikipedia, or via a browser tool operated by a reader, to (for example) add the subject to an address book. For more information about the use of [[microformat]]s on Wikipedia, please see [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Microformats|the microformat project]].
Date-of-birth ("bday") parameters will '''''only''''' be included in the microformat if {{tl|Birth date}} or {{tl|Birth date and age}} are used in the infobox.
hCard uses HTML classes including: {{flatlist}} *adr *bday *county-name *'''fn (required)''' *honorific-prefix *honorific-suffix *label *locality *nickname *note *org *role *vcard {{endflatlist}}
'''Please do not rename or remove these classes.'''
[[Category:Templates generating hCards|{{PAGENAME}}]]

{{pp-template|small=yes}} {{#ifeq:{{{small|}}}{{{expiry|ʁ}}}|yesʁ |
Image:Padlock.svg|20px default [[Wikipedia:Protection policy|This high-risk template or image included in one has been protected from editing to prevent vandalism]] desc none
|
[[Image:Padlock.svg|45px| ]] '''This {{#switch:{{NAMESPACE}} |{{ns:image}}=image, used in one or more [[Wikipedia:High-risk templates|high-risk templates]] and/or [[Special:Allmessages|system messages]], |#default=[[Wikipedia:High-risk templates|high-risk template]] }} has been [[Wikipedia:This page is protected|protected]] from editing to prevent [[Wikipedia:vandalism|vandalism]].''' ([{{fullurl:Special:Log|type=protect&page={{FULLPAGENAMEE}}}} protection log]). {{#switch:{{NAMESPACE}}|{{ns:image}}='''Do not move this image''' to [[commons:|Wikimedia Commons]].}}
}}

revision.text: {{#ifeq:{{{df}}}|yes|[[{{{3}}} {{MONTHNAME|{{{2}}}}}]]|[[{{MONTHNAME|{{{2}}}}} {{{3}}}]]}} [[{{{1}}}]]({{{1}}}-{{pad2digit|{{MONTHNUMBER|{{{2}}}}}}}-{{pad2digit|{{{3}}}}}) {{Template:Birth date and age/doc}} [[Category:Date mathematics templates|{{PAGENAME}}]]

{{template doc page transcluded}}{{template doc page viewed directly|[[Template:Birth date and age]]}} == Usage == These templates ('''{{tl|Birth date}}''' and '''{{tl|Birth date and age}}''') return a person's date of birth and optionally his/her age. Syntax: :{{Birth date|year of birth|month of birth|day of birth}} or :{{Birth date and age|year of birth|month of birth|day of birth}} Examples: :{{Birth date|1993|2|24}} returns "{{Birth date|1993|2|24}}" :{{Birth date and age|1993|2|24}} returns {{Birth date and age|1993|2|24}} An optional parameter, df, can be set to "yes" to display the day before the month. This is primarily used in articles about people from parts of the world where the day precedes the month in a date. Examples: :{{Birth date|1993|2|24|df=yes}} returns "{{Birth date|1993|2|24|df=yes}}" :{{Birth date and age|1993|2|24|df=yes}} returns "{{Birth date and age|1993|2|24|df=yes}}" The templates also return the date, hidden by CSS, in the [[ISO 8601]] format needed by [[:en:HCard|hCard microformat]]s. for example: :(1993-02-24) See [[:en:WP:UF|the microformats project]] for details. '''Note:''' The template will appear broken when the parameters are left blank (as seen above). [[Category:Date mathematics templates|{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Category:Templates generating hCards|{{PAGENAME}}]] [[da:Skabelon:Dato og alder]] [[no:Mal:Fødselsdato og alder]] [[fi:Malline:Syntymäaika ja ikä]] [[vi:Tiêu bản:Ngày sinh và tuổi]] [[ja:Template:生年月日と年齢]]

[[Usòrò:Human eye cross-sectional view grayscale.png|thumb]]'''Anya''' ahu bu ihe no na [[ahu]] mmadu na na anumanu eji elee he. Ndi mmadu na anumanu nnuku nwere anya [[abuo]]. Anya anyi nwere ike ihu mgbe he na-achaa, ma mgbe ona gbo oso. Onwere ike mata ma ahu ihe ina elee no dika concrete m'obu dika mmiri.
Anya ndi mmadu nwere ike cha dika eligwe, ala, ma dike anyaanwu.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Ahu]] * [[Nti]] * [[Ogene]]
[[Òtù:Ahu]]

revision.text:
[[Usòrò:Gray1234.png|150px|thumb|Aka la mmadu]] [[Usòrò:Tupaia cf javanica 050917 manc.jpg|thumb|Tupaia javanica, Homo sapiens]] '''Aka''' ahu bu mkpagara-[[ahu]] adiji enwere he. Ndi mmadu ma ndi anumanu nke ana-kpo ''primates'' nwere aka abuo, aka nke [[aka-nri]] ma [[aka-ikpa]]. Aka anyi kwesiri nwe [[mkpisi-aka]] ru [[ise]]. Mgbe ufodu, onye mmadu nwere ike inwe aka nke gbajiri n'eweghi mkpuru-aka ruru ise. Mgbe ufodi, anumanu nke enweghi aka ne nwe [[onu]] wo jide he. ==Leekwaa ihe ndị ozo== * [[Ahu]] * [[Onu]]
[[Òtù:Ahu]]

[[Ákwúkwó orünotu:Gray1207.png|right|150px|thumb|Nti nke aka-nri]]'''Nti''' mmadu bu mkpagara-[[ahu]] eji ege nti uka taa amata ihe mmadu n'ekwu, ma ihe n'emee n'uwa. Imerime mmadu na anumanu nwere nti. Nk'ozo dika agwo na ''grasshopper'' enweghi.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Ahu]] * [[Anya]]
[[Òtù:Ahu]]

'''Mkpisi-aka''' bu mkpisi ahu no na aka mmadu mana aka anumanu nke ana-kpo ''primates''. Obu mkpisi na di mee onye mmadu enwere ike ijide he ejide. Ndi mmadu kwesiri inwe mkpisi-aka ruru [[ise]].
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Aka]] * [[Ahu]]

==Lee nke ozo== * [[Ahu]] * [[Aka]]

==Onye amuru==
==Onye wuru==

=== [[User:SieBot|SieBot]] === '''[{{fullurl:Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval/SieBot|action=edit}} Voice your opinion]'''
Please give a bot bit to [[User:SieBot|SieBot]], so it will not flood your RC as it adds interwiki links using pywikipedia's interwiki.py. [[User:SieBot|SieBot]] is active on 200 Wikipedias. See the [[User:SieBot|user page]] of the bot for more details, or check a complete overview of its activities [[:nl:Gebruiker:SieBot/Overview|here]]. Cheers! [[User:Siebrand|Siebrand]] ([[:nl:User talk:Siebrand|talk]]) [[User:Siebrand|Siebrand]] 16:31, 18 August 2007 (UTC) :you guys appear to have a very peculiar bot approval procedure. Please request a bit at meta or let me know if I can do so. I'll just keep the bot running in the mean time, as it does not make more than a handful of edits per day. Cheers! [[User:Siebrand|Siebrand]] 13:18, 5 September 2007 (UTC) ---- # [[Image:Symbol_support_vote.svg|16px]] '''Support''' - I will support the nomination for bot-status, but I think you will find that there is a limited # of tasks for it to do. -- [[User talk:Kerowren|Kerowren]] <sup>([[User talk:Kerowren|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Kerowren|contribs]])</sup> 13:20, 5 September 2007 (UTC) #:As said, it is for interwiki purpuses only. Thanks. Cheers! [[User:Siebrand|Siebrand]] 13:21, 5 September 2007 (UTC)
'''Done''' by [[m:user:Shanel|Shanel]]. <small>—[[m:user:Pathoschild/s|Pathoschild]] 19:33, 7 September 2007 (UTC)</small>

revision.text:
Image:Crystal Clear action run.png|16x16px|Wikipedia Bots default [[Wikipedia:Bot policy]] desc none
{| border="0" class="toccolours" style="margin:0 auto;" |- |
[[Wikipedia:Bots|Bot policy]]{{·}} [[Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval|Requests for bot approval]]{{·}}[[Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval/Bots nwetere vote|Bots nwetere vote]]
|- |} {{{category|[[Category:Wikipedia bots|{{PAGENAME}} ]]}}}

{| class="wikitable" !style="font: bold xx-large serif;"|I |
'''Creating a user account and user page for the bot describing its functions.'''
please state the following: # To log the creation of the bot account under your operator account click [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Userlogin&type=signup here] while logged in. (Please note that if you fail to do this, your bot may be blocked quickly as a possible sock or unauthorized bot until you verify that you are the owner.) # Describe the bot's purpose, language it uses, what program(s) it uses ([[m:pywikipedia|pywikipedia]] framework, etc). # Describe whether it is manually assisted or automatically scheduled to run. # The period, if any, we should expect it to run. # Identify the maintainer. # Add the bot's user page to [[:Category:Wikipedia bots]] (By adding {{tlp|bot|your user name}} to the bot's user page) |- !style="font: bold xx-large serif;"|II |
'''Listing your bot here.'''
Replace BotName with your bot's user name in the box below and click the button. If this is a request for an additional task, put a task number as well (e.g. ''Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval/BotName 2''). # Complete the questions on the resulting page and save it. # '''[{{fullurl:Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval|action=edit§ion=1}} Edit this page]''', adding the following text to the appropriate section (replacing BotName with your bot's name): #: '''{{BRFA|''BotName''|''TaskNumber''|Open}}''' #: If this is a request for your bot's first task, leave TaskNumber blank (i.e., do not add it unless you added a number to the title of the page created above). That is, use the template '''{{BRFA|''BotName''||Open}}''' type=create editintro=Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval/Editintro preload=Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval/InputInit default=Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval/BotName buttonlabel=Request Bot Approval bgcolor=#eeeeff width=50 |- !style="font: bold xx-large serif;"|III |
'''Waiting for approval.'''
You must then wait for approval from an admin or someone in the [[Wikipedia:Bots/Approvals group|approvals group]]. Please add a link to the approval request to the bot's userpage. |}
The bot operator forgot to change the value for BotName either in the BRFA, or the box when creating it. Please go back and try again.

=== [[User:PipepBot|PipepBot]] === Hello! I ask for permission to run my interwiki bot [[User:PipepBot|PipepBot]] here, and to get a bot flag for it. * Operator: [[:it:User:Pipep]] * Purpose: Interwiki * Software: Pywikipedia * Has bot flag at: als, am, an, ar, ast, az, bat-smg, be, be-x-old, bn, bs, ca, ce, ceb, cs, cv, da, de, en, eo, et, fo, fr, frp, fur, fy, ga, gd, hr, ht, hy, id, ie, ilo, io, is, ja, ka, ksh, la, lb, li, lij, ln, lv, mk, ml, ms, nap, nds, nds-nl, nn, no, pms, rm, ro, roa-tara, ru-sib, scn, sh, simple, sl, sq, sr, su, sv, te, th, tl, udm, uk, vec, vo, wa, zea, zh-yue * Details: Interwiki using Pywikipediabot. It mostly runs manually assisted. May run automatically in some cases. Thank you! --[[:it:User:Pipep]] 19:29, 19 August 2007 (UTC) # [[Image:Symbol_support_vote.svg|16px]] '''Support''' - I support this bots nomination. Perhaps you can give a test edit. -- [[User talk:Kerowren|Kerowren]] <sup>([[User talk:Kerowren|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Kerowren|contribs]])</sup> 13:31, 5 September 2007 (UTC) :: I have now done 10 test edits. [[:it:User:Pipep]] 17:23, 6 September 2007 (UTC)
'''Done.''' <small>—[[m:user:Pathoschild/s|Pathoschild]] 18:01, 15 September 2007 (UTC)</small> :Thank you! [[:it:User:Pipep]] 15:24, 17 September 2007 (UTC)

==Ihe méré nị== * [[350]] – Generallus [[Magnentius]] kúfùrù [[Ndetu ndi Mpaghara Rome|Onye Mpaghara Roman]] [[Constans]], yáa tinyé onwe ya na oché Mpaghara. * [[474]] – [[Leo II (emperor)|Leo II]] bu [[Onye Mpaghara Byzantine]]. * [[532]] – [[Nsogbu Nika]] na [[Constantinople]] dàrà. * [[1126]] – [[Emperor Huizong (Song Dynasty)|Emperor Huizong]] wefùrù onwe ya na oché ọchíchì nke [[China|Ndi China]], ya tinye nwa ya nwoke nke o hürü ná ányá búrú [[Onye Mpaghara Qinzong nke Song|Onye Mpaghara Qinzong]].

page.title: Arise O Compatriots, Nigeria's Call Obey

revision.comment: [[M:User:Addbot|Bot:]] Migrating 31 interwiki links, now provided by [[d:|Wikidata]] on [[d:q237878]] [[M:User:Addbot/WDS|(translate me)]]
revision.text:
Uri nke bu national anthem nke [[Naigeria]] bua. Emere ya anthem n'ime afo [[1978]].
:Arise, O compatriots, Nigeria's call obey :To serve our fatherland :With love and strength and faith :The labour of our heroes past :Shall never be in vain :To serve with heart and might :One nation bound in freedom, peace and :unity.
:Oh God of creation, direct our noble cause :Guide our leaders right :Help our youth the truth to know :In love and honesty to grow :And living just and true :Great lofty heights attain :To build a nation where peace and justice :shall reign
M'bu ha mee ya national anthem, uri ana kpo "'''Nigeria We Hail Thee'''", bula, bido afo [[1960]]. Onye nwoke amuru na ala bekee dere ya.
:Nigeria, we hail thee, :Our own dear native land, :Though tribe and tongue may differ, :In brotherhood we stand, :Nigerians all, and proud to serve :our sovereign motherland.
:Our flag shall be a symbol, :That truth and justice reign, :In peace or battle honoured, :And this we count as gain :To hand on to our children :A banner without stain
:O Lord of all creation, :Grant this our one request :Help us to build a nation :Where no man is oppressed :And so, with peace and plenty, :Nigeria may be blessed.

revision.text:
=== [[User:BotMultichill|BotMultichill]] === Hi, i request a bot bit for [[User:BotMultichill|BotMultichill]]. * Botmaster : [[User:Multichill|Multichill]] * Bot's name : [[User:BotMultichill|BotMultichill]] * List of botflags on others wikipedias: about 100+ atm (see [[meta:User:Multichill]] for the current list) * Purpose: Interwiki (pywikipedia) * Technical details : [[User:BotMultichill|BotMultichill]] is an interwiki bot starting at the [[:nl:Gebruiker:BotMultichill|Dutch wikipedia]]. The bot uses the pywikipedia framework and runs day and night in autonomous mode. Sometimes the bot will run in manual assisted mode to solve interwiki conflicts. [[User:Multichill|Multichill]] 12:29, 5 September 2007 (UTC) ---- # [[Image:Symbol_support_vote.svg|16px]] '''Support''' - I support this nomination for bot status (this bot appears to be the most tame, perhaps you can also give a little test edit of capabilities?) -- [[User talk:Kerowren|Kerowren]] <sup>([[User talk:Kerowren|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Kerowren|contribs]])</sup> 13:31, 5 September 2007 (UTC)
'''Done.''' <small>—[[m:user:Pathoschild/s|Pathoschild]] 01:48, 21 September 2007 (UTC)</small>

revision.text:
[[Ákwúkwó orünotu:GI normal.jpg|thumb|280px|right| Afọ]]Afọ bu otu mkpagara-ahu ('organ') ndi mmadu ma anumanu nwere, edi iji eri he. Oru afọ bụ ihe ana-kpo "digestion." Mgbe mmadu tinyee ihe na onu ha, rie ya, ihe ahu na bia n'ime afo taa ahu onye ahu mee ya digest.
==Leekwaa ihe nke ozo== * [[Onu]] * [[Aka]]
[[Òtù:Ahu]]

[[Usòrò:Book of Mormon English Missionary Edition Soft Cover.jpg|thumb|150px|right]]
'''Akwụkwọ nke Momọn''' bụ otu akwụkwo nso nke ndi Momọn, ndi n'ekpewaa na [[ulo uka]] nk'ana kpo ''"Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints"''. Ndi bi n'ekperechi ha si n'o-gbasa ndu onye prophet haa, otu nkowe ana-kpo Momọn (Mormon).
==Lee nke ozo== * [[Akwụkwọ Nsọ]]
[[Òtù:Akwụkwọ nke Momọn]]

revision.comment: /* Lee nke ozo */clean up, replaced: {{-stub}} → {{ÉdéNtạ}} using [[Project:AWB|AWB]]
revision.text:
[[Usòrò:Flag of Utah.svg|thumb]] [[Usòrò:Seal of Utah (Alternate).svg|thumb]] [[Usòrò:Map of USA highlighting Utah.png|thumb]]
'''Yútạh'''(Utah) bu nkeji no n'ime ala ndi [[Njikota Obodo Amerika]]. Ọ bu nkeji nke gbárá 45 nke bányéré Njikota, na Önwa mbu 4, nke afọr 1896. Rúrú mádu nke 80% na nke bu 2,784,572 bịrị na ákụkụ [[Wasatch Front]], dí nẹ etítì [[Salt Lake City]]. Nké háfùrù àlà nke saará àsá na nkeji mádu adíghịtu, nke háfùrù ébé mádu bị nga Í gbá nke ishií na ébé ihe ha rürü jùrù na U.S. Áh`bu "Utah" shì mbà ndi [[Mbà Ute|Ute]] nke áhà bu "ndi úgwú ukwu" na [[ásụsụ Ute]]. Na ákùkù Yútạh bu [[Arizona]] na nlédà ya, [[Colorado]] na owuwa ya, [[Wyoming]] na òlilé owuwa ya, [[Idaho]] na òlilé ya, na [[Nevada]] na odida anyanwu ya. O nà metu [[New Mexico]] áka.
==Lee nke ozo== * [[United States of Amerika]]
{{ÉdéNtạ}}
[[Òtù:United States of Amerika]]

'''Obodoézè Nà Ofú''' (''United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland'') bu otu ala ndi ocha no na obodo ukwu adi-kpo [[Obodo Békè]] (''Europe''). Obu ndi na, bula ndi ocha biara n'ime [[Afrịka]] nonye na [[Naigeria]] n'oge gara-aga, bukwa wo bu ndi ocha nke ana kpo ndi [[békè']].

[[Usòrò:Map of USA highlighting Pennsylvania.png|thumb|200px|right]]
'''Àkù-ñkịtị nke Pennsylvania''' bụ [[nkeji obodo]] no nà ímé Olìlé ọwụwa na ámá [[Etítì Atlantic]] ímé [[Njikota Obodo nke Amerika]]. Nà ákùkù yá bụ [[Delaware]] na [[Maryland]] na nleda ya, [[West Virginia]] na nleda odida ya, [[Ohio]] na odida ya, [[New York]] na [[Ontario]] ímé [[Kanada]] na nlélé ya, na [[New Jersey]] owuwa ya. [[Ama ukwu]] nke kárírí ndi mádụ bụ [[Philadelphia]], [[Pittsburgh]], [[Allentown]] na [[Erie]]. Íshí oche ya bu [[Harrisburg]].
==Lee nke ozo== * [[United States of Amerika]]

revision.text:
[[Usòrò:Flag of Virginia.svg|thumb|200px|Ọkọlóto Végíníyà]] [[Usòrò:Map of USA VA.svg|thumb|200px|Ébé Virginia nọr na Amerika]] '''Àkù-ñkịtị nke Virginia''' bu otu nkeji obodo nọr nà [[Njikota Obodo Amerika]] nke nọr na ikpele ya nke Atlantic na [[Nledà anyanwu Njikota Obodo]]. Ha tùrù Virginia ótụ áhà nke "Old Dominion" ("Obodo ichié") na ọ di mgbe ha na kpó ya ("Mother of Presidents") "Mmá ndi íshí Obodo" màkà ndi íshí U.S bu ébé ha mùrù ha ímérímé. Àlà na ufùlù nkeji nke di na áká [[Blue Ridge Mountains]] na [[Chesapeake Bay]], ébé ìfulū na ihe àlà ndi ozor nke ya nọr. Íshí [[Àkù-ñkịtị]] nka bu [[Richmond]]; [[Virginia Beach]] bu nke mádu kàrìrì na [[Fairfax County]] bu nkeji-ndọndó nke kárírí mádu. Nkeji nke nwèrè mádu rúrú nde asaátọ.

revision.text: [[Usòrò:LocationPoland.png|thumb|right|250px|Ebe Poland no n'ime [[Europe]]]][[Usòrò:Flag of Poland.svg|thumb|right|250px|Okoloto Poland]] [[File: Herb Polski.svg|thumb|left|150px|Poland]] '''Poland''', nke ana kpokwaa '''Ochíchìíwú Poland''', bu otu obodo ndi ocha no n'etiti obodo-ukwu nwo, nke [[Obodo Békè]]. Akuko Poland bu akuko ukwu bidoro na oge okeye, mbu akpowa ala ahu Poland. O no na [[aka-ikpa]] [[Jémanị]].

'''Chad''', bukwaa '''Republic of Chad''', bu otu obodo ndi oji no n'ime ala ukwu nke ana kpo [[Afrịka]]. Chad no na aka-ikpa [[Naigeria]]. Isi ya bu [[N'Djamena]].
